summary: This is an email chain from June 27, 2020, forwarding a picture. The email is from 'RO' to Mark L. Epstein, with the subject 'Re: Final', instructing him to 'Read this picture'. The document is part of the Epstein case files and appears to be a communication regarding an image attachment.

persons.name: Mark L. Epstein
persons.context: The email is addressed to Mark L. Epstein, with the subject 'Re: Final' and the instruction to 'Read this picture'.

persons.name: Stacey Richman
persons.context: The email is forwarded to Stacey Richman, who is likely an attorney or legal representative involved in the case.

persons.name: MLE
persons.context: The email is forwarded by 'MLE' to Stacey Richman and possibly others, with the original date and attachment.

connections.description: RO sends an email directly to Mark L. Epstein with an instruction and an image attachment.
MLE forwards the email from RO to Mark L. Epstein onward to Stacey Richman.

events.title: Email forwarding regarding picture
events.description: An email is forwarded by MLE to Stacey Richman, containing an original email from RO to Mark L. Epstein with the subject 'Re: Final' and an instruction to 'Read this picture', along with an image attachment.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated June 27, 2020, involving Mark L. Epstein and others.
The email instructs Mark L. Epstein to 'Read this picture', indicating the significance of an attached image (IMG_20200627_113832.jpg).
The email is forwarded to Stacey Richman, suggesting her involvement in legal or advisory matters related to the correspondence.
The document is part of the Epstein case files (EFTA00146874), indicating it is relevant to the investigation or legal proceedings.
